name: Slice Of Amethyst Necklace
description:
This gorgeous beaded necklace features fall colors. The beaded necklace includes faceted labradorite, pyrite, freshwater pearls, and andalusite accented with a slice of amethyst pendant.

Necklace measures approx. 31.5" with a 2" chain extension.
Pendant measures approx. 1"L

Will ship in 2 to 5 days.

Thank you!

name: Abalone Cross Necklace
description:
14k gold fill wire wrapped freshwater pearl, faceted labradorite, faceted pyrite, necklace accented with abalone cross. The cross was designed to be on the side of the necklace as per picture.

Necklace approx. 25.5"L. 

Custom length available by request.

name: Leather Citrine Mala with Dragon
description:
Leather hand knotted mala with faceted citrine and hand carved mother of pearl dragon.

A stone of manifestation, Citrine brings our thoughts into being on the physical plane, helping us to realize our dreams. It is especially useful for desires involving happiness, wealth, success and communication.

The Dragon- Often associated with Buddha Nature, the dragon is able to expand, contract or transform its body and has the power of invisibility. It possesses a mysterious power and presence not entirely graspable by the worldly mind. Living in the watery realms of seas and lakes and mists, it is present, yet elusive and hidden. And in its realm time exists differently than in the terrestrial, human realm. Holding a globe, the dragon is the guardian of the Jewel of Enlightenment. 
Meditation japa mala is a string of prayer beads used for reciting or chanting a mantra or other forms of spiritual exercise , meditation or sadhana, generally known as "japa/jaap".

Malas are great tools to aid in meditation. They have been used over centuries by beginners as well as experienced practitioners of meditation. They help in creating a proper mindset and mood for meditation. Helps focus the ever wandering mind on one point.The mala beads are moved in rhythm with the breath and the mantra. This practice helps both-sleepy as well as excessively distracted mental frame to be balanced during meditation. The malas when used regularly with a personal mantra, absorbs the vibrations of the practice.

Briolette pendant  measures approx. 20mm * 10mm

name: Labradorite Rosary Necklace
description:
Luxurious labradorite rosary necklace

From start to finish, this rosary is gorgeous! The Hail Marys are faceted labradorite for extra sparkle.

The entire rosary is wire-wrapped in 14k gold fill wire. This is a rosary, built to last for generations.

The cross is 24k gold plated sterling silver with bezel set faceted labradorite and is artisan made.

All rosaries from Amaria are handcrafted and the workmanship is guaranteed.

Why an heirloom rosary? The simple answer is quality. This collection of rosaries features only quality materials. The wire used is solid metal wire.

It is also quality construction. In the beaded rosaries, each bead is meticulously wire-wrapped to the next, no open loops to pull apart.

An heirloom rosary is one that will stand the test of time. One that will last not only your lifetime but those of the generations to which it is passed. A true, beautiful, family heirloom.

This rosary can be made into a rosary ( take the spring clasp off ) by request at time of purchase.

Rosary necklace will be packaged in a fine jewelry box.

Will ship in 2 to 5 days.

Thank you!

name: Silver Pearl Rosary Necklace
description:
Luxurious silver pearl rosary

From start to finish, this rosary has a brilliant and lustrous glow. The pearls used are freshwater silver pearls.

The entire rosary is wire-wrapped in sterling silver wire. This is a rosary, built to last for generations.

The cross is sterling silver wire wrapped filigree artisan made.

All rosaries from Amaria are handcrafted and the workmanship is guaranteed.

Why an heirloom rosary? The simple answer is quality. This collection of rosaries features only quality materials. The wire used is solid metal wire, nothing plated or coated. The same goes for the centers and crucifixes, solid metals not colored base metals. 

It is also quality construction. In the beaded rosaries, each bead is meticulously wire-wrapped to the next, no open loops to pull apart.

An heirloom rosary is one that will stand the test of time. One that will last not only your lifetime but those of the generations to which it is passed. A true, beautiful, family heirloom.

Each rosary is packaged in a fine jewelry box.

Because of their delicacy, pearls should be stored separately, away from hard jewelry items, to prevent scratches or other damage. If possible, store them wrapped in soft cloth or in a soft-lined container, pouch, or jewelry box.
